prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalEconomyDigest 
Title: The Socio-Economic Impact of Climate Change in Developing Countries
Description: Explore an in-depth analysis of how climate change is affecting developing economies. This article delves into the impacts on agriculture, infrastructure and the steps these countries are taking to mitigate the effects.

I am kind of interested in reading this article. It seems like a big issue today so it would be nice to know how much our society is impacting climate change. This is a really controversial topic as well so I would like to see some answers.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumPhysicsToday
Title: Exploring the Concept of Quantum Entanglement: Its Intricacies and Applications
Description: Dive deep into the fascinating world of quantum physics with our detailed explanation on quantum entanglement. Learn how this strange phenomenon has the potential to revolutionize communication, computation, and even teleportation.
This article sounds really cool/interesting! I've heard of Quantum entaglement before, but it never made much sense to me.. New technology is always interesting to read about though,

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisanBakeryNews 
Title: The Art and Science of Sourdough Bread Making: A Historic and Culinary Perspective
Description: Uncover the secrets of traditional sourdough bread making. This article blends history, food science, and culinary arts to provide a comprehensive understanding of this timeless baking craft. Learn how sourdough's unique fermentation process creates its distinctive flavor, and get tips from master bakers for making your own at home.

I would definitely read this article if its not too long. I've always wanted to know how sourdough bread is made, as it is pretty tasty. Its on of my favorites so it would be nice to see tips from the master bakers.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureMedicine 
Title: Exploration of AI in Healthcare: Predicting Diseases Before They Happen
Description: Explore the pioneering world of Artificial Intelligence in healthcare. Learn about how machine learning can help predict diseases before symptoms even appear and how these revolutionary technologies are reshaping the future of medicine. Understand the ethical implications and challenges of using AI in disease prediction and prevention.
This topic does not interest me that much, I would probably not read this article. It is an important subject but boring to me personally.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
